BugInstance.message: net.guto.hellow.core.SocketConnection.connect(String, int) invokes System.exit(...), which shuts down the entire virtual machine
Synchronization on SocketConnection.socket in futile attempt to guard it
net.guto.hellow.core.SocketConnection.nextCommand() ignores result of java.io.BufferedReader.read(char[], int, int)
net.guto.hellow.core.pojos.Contact.getGroups() may expose internal representation by returning Contact.groups
new net.guto.hellow.core.pojos.Contact(String, String, int, int[]) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into Contact.groups
net.guto.hellow.core.pojos.Contact.setGroups(int[]) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into Contact.groups
net.guto.hellow.protocol.Msnp8.execute(String) uses equals to compare an array and nonarray
